name: International Society of Automation
description: The International Society of Automation (www.isa.org) is a nonprofit professional association that sets the standard for those who apply engineering and technology to improve the management, safety, and cybersecurity of modern automation and control systems used across industry and critical infrastructure. Our mission at Texas A&M is to act as a bridge between the Students and Industry and disseminate the highest quality of automation information worldwide.
